snippet.title: Baby Blues Nightmare - [OLD] Announcement Trailer 2024 (Toddler Horror Survival Game)
snippet.description:
WISHLIST IT NOW ON STEAM ►► https://store.steampowered.com/app/2836820/Baby_Blues_Nightmares__Toddler_Horror_Game

Join Our DISCORD ►► https://discord.com/invite/d8WUuuRCJK

Hello everybody! Hope you are all good. I have been working on Baby Blues Nightmare for some time now back-to-back with Rotten Flesh. This was suppose to be released last year as a 10-year anniversary from 'Baby Blues' but had to be delayed. I had to announce it now due to the steam fest :( .. but hope you enjoy! Please like, comment and subscribe if you like it.

Baby Blues Nightmare is a survival horror stealth game where you play as a toddler and have to do what it takes in order to survive your horror-ish nightmares of what's real and not. Fix, maintain and customize your Tricycle to roam around your little world with. Run, hide and survive but remember; try not to cry when you are scared.. or the monsters will hear you and get you.

WISHLIST IT ON STEAM ►https://store.steampowered.com/app/2836820/Baby_Blues_Nightmares__Toddler_Horror_Game

GAME Press Kit ► https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1VQTT2cM-Wu9qFtN7UzXuwZTP3ALsAazQ?usp=sharing

IndieDB ► https://www.indiedb.com/games/baby-blues-nightmares-toddler-horror-game

Website ► https://steelkrill.com

Twitter ► https://twitter.com/steelkrill

TikTok ► https://TikTok.com/@SteelkrillStudio

Instagram ► https://instagram.com/Steelkrill

#horrorgamestamillive  #horrorgames2023 #horrorgaming #horrorstories #halloween #scarygaming #gamingvideos #newgames #gaming #mascotas
